thread.title: Ohio authorities: Trucker held in 4 slayings a serial killer
thread.title_full: Ohio authorities: Trucker held in 4 slayings a serial killer

title: Ohio authorities: Trucker held in 4 slayings a serial killer
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
Prosecutors say a Cleveland truck driver indicted on multiple counts of aggravated murder in the slayings of four people is a serial killer....
